AIR.DESCRIPTION: This card can only be played if you have Flight.

BREW.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a potion after a specific amount of turns.

BREWING.DESCRIPTION: You need less turns to brew potions.

DISORIENTED.DESCRIPTION: The first Attack of the Enemy has no effect.

FLIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Reduce attack damage taken by 50%. Reduced by one if you get attacked.

TAXING.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 more energy for every time you played this card for this combat.

THIRSTY.DESCRIPTION: Potions used against the enemy are 50% more effective.

VIRUS.DESCRIPTION: Poison applied to the enemy other than by Virus spreads to all other enemies instantly.
